Rules
Playing on our server means that you agree with the following rules so please read them carefully.
Not knowing the rules is not an excuse.
1. All members are equal and must follow the server rules, otherwise it will lead to punishment.
2. Using exploits and 3rd part software to gain advantage is strictly forbidden.
3. All exploits should be immediately reported. Using them will be punishable with ban.
4. If your game account gets banned, you are not entitled to any reimbursement or refund.
5. Upon server's or player's fault Administration will not take responsibility for lost items, services etc.
6. In its absolute discretion Administration may chose to make exception to rule 5.
7. We will not tolerate abuse, excessive trolling, racist or xenophobic behaviour.
8. Administration will not distribute free items outside of events or special rewards.

Remember, be a fair and respectful Dwarf, or be treated like an Ogre!
DWARVEN MANUFACTURE - COMMUNITY BOARD
